languages.text: {n}Лейтенант Вент смертельно бледнеет. Глаза молодой женщины расширены от страха, но губы упрямо сжимаются в линию.{/n} "Хотите вырезать всех в Четвертом Складочном — начинайте с меня!"
{n}Lieutenant Vent turns deathly pale. Her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you'll have to start with me!"
languages.original_text: {n}Лейтенант Вент смертельно бледнеет. Глаза молодой женщины расширены от страха, но губы упрямо сжимаются в линию.{/n} "Хотите вырезать всех в Четвертом Складочном — начинайте с меня!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lieutenant Vent turns deathly pale. Her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you'll have to start with me!"
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}温特中尉变得面如死灰。她恐惧地瞪大了眼睛，但嘴唇却紧紧地抿成了一条线。{/n}“如果您打算杀光四号货栈所有人，那就从我开始吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Lieutenant Vent turns deathly pale. Her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you'll have to start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}温特中尉变得面如死灰。她恐惧地瞪大了眼睛，但嘴唇却紧紧地抿成了一条线。{/n}“如果您打算杀光四号货栈所有人，那就从我开始吧！”
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}La teniente Vent se vuelve completamente pálida. Sus ojos traicionan su miedo, pero aprieta los labios con firmeza.{/n} «¡Si queréis fusilar a todo el depósito 4, empezad conmigo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Lieutenant Vent turns deathly pale. Her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you'll have to start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La teniente Vent se vuelve completamente pálida. Sus ojos traicionan su miedo, pero aprieta los labios con firmeza.{/n} «¡Si queréis fusilar a todo el depósito 4, empezad conmigo!».
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}ヴェント副官が蒼白になる。目は恐怖で大きく見開かれ、唇は固く結ばれていた。{/n}「第四倉庫の全員を殺戮したいのなら、手始めに私を殺すといい！」
languages.original_text: {n}Lieutenant Vent turns deathly pale. Her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you'll have to start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴェント副官が蒼白になる。目は恐怖で大きく見開かれ、唇は固く結ばれていた。{/n}「第四倉庫の全員を殺戮したいのなら、手始めに私を殺すといい！」
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}Lieutenant Vent wird totenblass. Ihre Augen sind vor Angst weit aufgerissen, doch ihre Lippen sind zu einer festen Linie zusammengepresst.{/n} "Wenn Ihr alle in Depot 4 niedermähen wollt, werdet Ihr mit mir anfangen müssen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Lieutenant Vent turns deathly pale. Her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you'll have to start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lieutenant Vent wird totenblass. Ihre Augen sind vor Angst weit aufgerissen, doch ihre Lippen sind zu einer festen Linie zusammengepresst.{/n} "Wenn Ihr alle in Depot 4 niedermähen wollt, werdet Ihr mit mir anfangen müssen!"
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}Blanche comme un linge, Vent écarquille les yeux d'effroi, mais serre les lèvres d'un air déterminé.{/n} « Si vous voulez massacrer tout le monde au dépôt 4, il faudra d'abord me passer sur le corps ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Lieutenant Vent turns deathly pale. Her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you'll have to start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Blanche comme un linge, Vent écarquille les yeux d'effroi, mais serre les lèvres d'un air déterminé.{/n} « Si vous voulez massacrer tout le monde au dépôt 4, il faudra d'abord me passer sur le corps ! »
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: {n}Teğmen Vent'in beti benzi küle dönüyor. Gözleri korkudan büyürken dudakları dümdüz bir çizgide buluşuyor.{/n} "4. Depo'daki herkesi biçecekseniz önce beni geçmeniz gerekecek!"
languages.original_text: {n}Lieutenant Vent turns deathly pale. Her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you'll have to start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Teğmen Vent'in beti benzi küle dönüyor. Gözleri korkudan büyürken dudakları dümdüz bir çizgide buluşuyor.{/n} "Depo 4'teki herkesi biçecekseniz önce beni geçmeniz gerekecek!"
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
